website_summaries.verdict: The Lexmark Impact S305's low price tag, simple setup, and straightforward features are sure to draw in budget customers with intermittent printing needs. With extra features like wireless printing and a media card reader, the Impact earns a solid recommendation.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good printer.
customer_reviews.text: I live it. I wish I hadn’t threw my other one away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use prints nice makes great copys
customer_reviews.text: I had a lexmark before I needed to buy a nether printer. This one looked great. And it's easy to use The Ink replacement is affordable and easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used.
customer_reviews.text: Got used. Doesn't print good. Needs repaired or trashed. Could've bought refurbished with full ink at biglots for 79. Had to put 129 in inks to even find out if it worked
customer_reviews.author: Steven McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months, this machine started printing oddly at times, then one day it refused to work at all. Lexmark sent a replacement, and after waiting a week for it to arrive, I found I couldn't install the replacement as I had installed the original. Their tech support is only available limited hours. The printer also sucks up expensive ink like a dry sponge. The only good things are the low cost and that it prints pretty fast. If you like frustration and dealing with things that don't work they way they're supposed to, this is a good way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Las Trampas

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Newer "Licensed Return Cartridges" Version
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this printer yesterday at a local store, I noticed that the fine print on top of the box says the ink cartridges are "Licensed Return Program" version. According to at least one ink-refill seller on eBay, this means you cannot refill them. Given the tiny amount of ink in the provided cartridges, and the high price of carts from the manufacturer, I don't see a reason to keep this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MASSIVELY s#^*#* printer - WORST EVER HANDS DOWN
customer_reviews.text: have dealt with some pretty bad, and sometimes despotic technology over the years, but this one takes the cake. it will not let you print ANYTHING if a cartridge is low, and you have to buy ONLY the expensive lexmark cartridges, and they don't last at all. also, it will, as so many have described, eventually end up printing nothing. if you go on line, you'll find the same from almost anyone who purchases a Lexmark. nothing but problems, and zero - i mean zero - help from the company. STAY AWAY FROM LEXMARK.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: This was horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a year with this piece of crap! It falls off the network for no reason. Even the computer that's hardwired to it loses connection and I have to hard-reset the printer then re-install it. After THAT, I have to constantly clean the printhead, which uses a TON of ink, because it's always drying up or just leaking or the ink just DISAPPEARS. Tired of it. Bought an HP Deskjet. This will become target practice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE
customer_reviews.text: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE! I have wasted so much money on toner, I am finally throwing this piece of crap out. As others say, even if you want to print only black and white, you can't, because your color toner will go dry, and you won't be able to print. The customer service folks know this, as on occasion they send me free color toner. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Where is the class action lawsuit re: false advertising. And if you don't print a lot, the toner will go dry, and ... you guessed it ... you have to buy more toner. A SCAM - SEND BACK TO CHINA!
customer_reviews.author: Hal Itozis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend going to Kinko's instead.
customer_reviews.text: This printer is absolute garbage. It will not print and will be stuck in queue. Then, when you decide to delete it, it will be stuck in delete. The company's tech support just takes you into a round robin of unplugging the printer and plugging it back in, in an attempt that it will try to reset itself. I'm staring at mine right now and debating taking it to an open field and giving it some "Office Space" attention. I wouldn't give this printer any stars at all, but amazon is making me give it at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Greggory

customer_reviews.title: Worse Printer I have EVER owned!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this printer!! We were given this printer as a gift and this has been by far the WORSE printer that we have ever owned! Most of the time there is a document that is stuck in the "deleting" phase and this is after you send it to the printer and it does not print and you try to delete it. If you happen to get that issue resolved do not get excited because it will only do it again and again and.....again and you get my point. If I could give a product a negative rating in stars this would have a -5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: tlevine

customer_reviews.title: I wish I read the reviews before I bought this. . .
customer_reviews.text: All the negative reviews are true. Bought this at the store and refilled all the inks to find it wouldn't work anymore. Only prints now in the top left corner of the page, leaving the rest of the sheet blank. I hate this printer. I can't believe how poorly their CS is as well as the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Debrashemesh

customer_reviews.title: Eats up ink!
customer_reviews.text: This printer works very well. The only problem is that I am spending way too much for ink! I thought my old HP was bad, but this one is way worse. It is only a year old and working well, but I will be giving it to the Salvation Army and getting a new printer. I will certainly check out the ink use when I do!
customer_reviews.author: Pishi

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, all I want is to print is a stinking letter! But it will not print, because one of the color cartridges says its low. Had the printer for about two years and always have to buy ink every other month, I only print about 10 to 20 pages in two months. Such junk!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmuffintop

customer_reviews.title: Close your eyes and try to imagine the worst printer ever...
customer_reviews.text: One star is FAR too generous. Please don't waste you're time (SO much time) or money on this "printer." There will ALWAYS be an issue keeping you from simply printing and you will ALWAYS be out of ink - ALWAYS as in nearly 100% of the time!!! I can't even imagine a printer worse than the Lexmark S301!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Had this printer for 1.5 years and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer for free with my macbook pro. I has given me so many problems throughout the first year, I stopped using it for about 7 months it worked now for about two days now it says their is a print head error. i called technical support they couldn't even help me. Its time for a better printer this one was good at first now it stopped functioning at all! I can see why lexmark stopped making inkjet printers they are literally terrible.
customer_reviews.author: 1996girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it-zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Printer from Hell - had to give one star to be able to submit comments! Don't buy it!!! Eats up ink- when you replace cartridges you have to spend and waste time and more ink doing head cleaning etc etc, ink oozes out - be careful! What a mess it makes !!! Spent money on whole set of cartridges and it still won't print properly!! The old cartridges were 22% full but wouldn't print - what a con
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Carson

customer_reviews.title: The worst printer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The worst printer I've ever owned. Waste of money. It'll say that the ink needs replacing every ten pages. The worst
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: it's bad. We have wasted so many hours trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as the reviews have indicated.. it's bad. We have wasted so many hours trying to get this thing to print.... please don't buy this printer.
customer_reviews.author: E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This IS the worst printer I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This piece of garbage sucks up ink and constantly finds new reasons to fail. Forget the wireless and as for the other abilities - who cares. Waste of money, waste of time, glitchy software. What else is left - oh yeah. Once any of the print levels go below a certain point - it stops printing. Do yourself a favour and avoid this printer.
customer_reviews.author: R Mac

customer_reviews.title: Massively Huge P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: Printer stinks ... you have to invest $80 in ink after the default ink runs out or you will not be able to print. Think I am wrong? Try it the math yourself ... you have to buy 4 cartridges of ink at $18 each ... Lexmark can stick this where the sun does not shine. I wish there were a zero star review.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Lexmarks are the worst printers EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the other reviews! Lexmarks are the worst printers EVER! I despise this piece of junk. Full ink cartridges and I get message to replace ink. I'll never have a Lexmark product again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: First the ink goes far too fast,I am constantly buying new ink. Now it won't print at all due to a false print head error message. Lexmark knows there are problems yet does nothing. Tried troubleshooting,did everything Lexmark says to do and still nothing! Do not buy save yourself the money and headache!
customer_reviews.author: ronna topper

customer_reviews.title: This printer works great when it works
customer_reviews.text: This printer works great when it works. I think I spend an average of 30 minutes troubleshooting for every page I print. There's always something wrong! This is a crap printer from a crap company!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baker

customer_reviews.title: Piece of s**t
customer_reviews.text: Worst printer I have ever owned by far. Constant problems. Now it wont even feed paper properly. Looking forward to smashing this piece of crap ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: SpainKiller

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend not purchasing this printer. Mine broke after the 5th document that I printed due to a 'printhead' issue. Troubleshooting didn't work, their support was horrible, and I ended up having to throw it away. Save your money and your time!!!
customer_reviews.author: dantheman

customer_reviews.title: worst printer
customer_reviews.text: The Lexmark s305 is the worst printer there is. Will not print and you can not delete it. Do not buy this item. Sorry I did.
customer_reviews.author: richlin1

product_meta.title: Lexmark Impact S301 Wireless All-In-One Printer
product_meta.description: Printer, Scanner, Copier - 33 ppm Mono/30 ppm Color Print - 4800 x 1200 dpi Print - 25 cpm Mono/21 cpm Color Copy LCD - 1200 dpi Optical Scan - 100 sheets Input - Wi-Fi - PictBridge - USB
